text: Wosiwosi amuba lifwa lilibanyoola, kata nimuli mutsinzu tsiolukoba. Ne lilayi nilibanyoola baboola mbu, lino lirula khu Nyasaye. Ne libii nilibanyoola ni boboola mbu; “Lino lirula khwiwe.” Boola koosi karulananga nende Nyasaye. Ne bali nende shina Abandu bano kata shibakhaaba okhumanya amakhuwa tawe
